alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 12:27AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Richland County through 100 AM CDT... At 1227 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wyndmere, or 26 miles west of Wahpeton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wyndmere around 1235 AM CDT. Barney and Mooreton around 100 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
